trans-unit.source: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding
trans-unit.target: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding

trans-unit.source: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the MapLocationFinder class in the Windows.Services.Maps namespace.
trans-unit.target: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the MapLocationFinder class in the Windows.Services.Maps namespace.

trans-unit.source: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding
trans-unit.target: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class in the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class in the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** To learn more about using maps in your app, download the following sample from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: **Tip** To learn more about using maps in your app, download the following sample from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub.

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample

trans-unit.source: Here's how the classes for geocoding and reverse geocoding are related:
trans-unit.target: Here's how the classes for geocoding and reverse geocoding are related:

trans-unit.source: The [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class has methods that do geocoding ([**FindLocationsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636925)) and reverse geocoding ([**FindLocationsAtAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636928)).
trans-unit.target: The [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class has methods that do geocoding ([**FindLocationsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636925)) and reverse geocoding ([**FindLocationsAtAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636928)).

trans-unit.source: These methods return a [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551).
trans-unit.target: These methods return a [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551).

trans-unit.source: The [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551) contains a collection of [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) objects.
trans-unit.target: The [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551) contains a collection of [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) objects.

trans-unit.source: Access this collection through the [**Locations**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627552) property of the **MapLocationFinderResult**.
trans-unit.target: Access this collection through the [**Locations**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627552) property of the **MapLocationFinderResult**.

trans-unit.source: Each [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) object contains a [**MapAddress**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627533) object.
trans-unit.target: Each [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) object contains a [**MapAddress**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627533) object.

trans-unit.source: Access this object through the [**Address**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636929) property of each **MapLocation**.
trans-unit.target: Access this object through the [**Address**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636929) property of each **MapLocation**.

trans-unit.source: **Important** You must specify a maps authentication key before you can use map services.
trans-unit.target: **Important** You must specify a maps authentication key before you can use map services.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Request a maps authentication key](authentication-key.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Request a maps authentication key](authentication-key.md).

trans-unit.source: Get a location (Geocode)
trans-unit.target: Get a location (Geocode)

trans-unit.source: Convert an address or a place name to a geographic location (geocoding) by performing the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Convert an address or a place name to a geographic location (geocoding) by performing the following steps.

trans-unit.source: Call one of the overloads of the [**FindLocationsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636925) method of the [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class.
trans-unit.target: Call one of the overloads of the [**FindLocationsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636925) method of the [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class.

trans-unit.source: The [**FindLocationsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636925) method returns a [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551) object that contains a collection of matching [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) objects.
trans-unit.target: The [**FindLocationsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636925) method returns a [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551) object that contains a collection of matching [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) objects.

trans-unit.source: Access this collection through the [**Locations**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627552) property of the [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551).
trans-unit.target: Access this collection through the [**Locations**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627552) property of the [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551).

trans-unit.source: This code displays the following results to the `tbOutputText` textbox.
trans-unit.target: This code displays the following results to the `tbOutputText` textbox.

trans-unit.source: Get an address (reverse geocode)
trans-unit.target: Get an address (reverse geocode)

trans-unit.source: Convert a geographic location to an address (reverse geocoding) by performing the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Convert a geographic location to an address (reverse geocoding) by performing the following steps.

trans-unit.source: Call the [**FindLocationsAtAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636928) method of the [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class.
trans-unit.target: Call the [**FindLocationsAtAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636928) method of the [**MapLocationFinder**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class.

trans-unit.source: The [**FindLocationsAtAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636928) method returns a [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551) object that contains a collection of matching [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) objects.
trans-unit.target: The [**FindLocationsAtAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636928) method returns a [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551) object that contains a collection of matching [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549) objects.

trans-unit.source: Access this collection through the [**Locations**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627552) property of the [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551).
trans-unit.target: Access this collection through the [**Locations**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627552) property of the [**MapLocationFinderResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627551).

trans-unit.source: Access the [**MapAddress**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627533) object through the [**Address**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636929) property of each [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549).
trans-unit.target: Access the [**MapAddress**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627533) object through the [**Address**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636929) property of each [**MapLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627549).

trans-unit.source: This code displays the following results to the `tbOutputText` textbox.
trans-unit.target: This code displays the following results to the `tbOutputText` textbox.
